name: OpenXservices.com
tag_list: adserver, openx-consulting, openx-services, openads, advertisment-server, setup-adnetwork
overview:
OpenXservices.com firm provides technology consulting to install, upgrade, customize OpenX. Apart from that it has provided various kinds of integrations. OpenX also has provided various kind of targeting solutions as well as Adnetwork Revenue Optimization to monetize the revenue for publishers.

Its recent addition includes building up a mobile ads plugin for OpenX which has been huge success among online advertising companies. OpenXservices.com also presently work on finding solutions in areas of DSP (Demand Side Platform), RTB (Real Time Bidding), Mobile ads Revenue Optimization, Mobile Re-targeting, etc.
